While the robot sounds like a good idea, I personally don't think it would 
belong in Gladiators.  Maybe in a similiar game with a science fiction theme. 
 A robot would just look out of place among elementals and archers and other 
fantasy creatures.  I also thought of a promotion.  A druid could become a 
Sorceror sometime that could summon special forest creatures like wolfs and 
bears and whatever.
